name: Digital Research Infrastructure for the Arts and Humanities
membership: DARIAH ERIC is member of the European Alliance for Social Sciences and Humanities (EASSH)
goal:
DARIAH (Digital Research Infrastructure for the
Arts and Humanities) is the European ERIC
(European Research Infrastructure Consortium) to
enhance and develop digital humanities research in
Europe. DARIAH offers a portfolio of services and activities centered around research communities to help develop national initiatives and transnational research in digital arts and humanities. DARIAH was established as a European legal entity, the DARIAH-ERIC, on 15 August 2014. Currently DARIAH has 17 Members: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Cyprus, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, The Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Serbia and Slovenia. As a European legal entity, the DARIAH-ERIC offers an important first step in facilitating the long-term sustainability of our work for pan-European research infrastructures for the wider European arts and humanities research community and beyond.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Research in Digital Humanities, European funds (Horizon 2020, ERDF, ESIF, Erasmus+), ethics and legal issues related to research, ESFRI.
